biography.bio: Gorgeous, buxom, and shapely 5'6" brunette knockout Alektra Blue was born Sasha Clifford on June 9, 1983 in Phoenix, Arizona. Blue played soccer and volleyball, ran track, and was a cheerleader in grade school while growing up in Dallas, Texas. Her first job was as a receptionist at a fitness center. Alektra worked as a bartender in Texas prior to her involvement in the adult entertainment industry. Blue first began working in the sex industry at age twenty-one in January, 2005; her friend and fellow porn starlet Taryn Thomas helped Blue get into said industry. Blue won the F.A.M.E. Award for Favorite Rookie Starlet of the Year in 2006 and was nominated for an AVN Award for Best New Starlet in 2007. The green-eyed stunner was the Pet of the Month in the April, 2008 issue of Penthouse. (Other men's magazines Alektra has been featured in are Club, Cheri, Hustler, and Genesis.) Blue also signed an exclusive performance contract with the top company Wicked Pictures in April, 2008. Alektra has since gone on to win additional AVN Awards for Best Group Sex Scene in 2010 and The Fan Awards - Best Body in 2011.
biography.name: Alektra Blue

biography.bio: Buxom and shapely 5'4" brunette knockout Lea Lexus was born Laura Stan on February 18, 1988 in Romania. Lexus aspired to be an actress when she was a kid. The hazel-eyed stunner first began performing in explicit hardcore movies at age 19 in 2007; she specializes in anal sex scenes and has appeared in X-rated features for such notable companies as Brazzers, Evil Angel, Digital Sin, Red Light District, and Digital Playground. Lea has a pierced navel and resides in Los Angeles, California.
biography.name: Lea Lexis

biography.bio: Very pretty and petite 5'3" brunette Presley Hart was born on December 1, 1988 in Anaheim, California. She's the middle child in a family of three daughters. Hart moved around frequently while growing up and spent a lot of time in Colorado, where her father was in the Navy. Moreover, Presley was also a dancer as a kid. Hart attended college and worked in a variety of jobs prior to her involvement in the adult entertainment industry. Presley did her first hardcore scene for the adult website Reality Kings and began performing in explicit hardcore movies in 2011. Among the notable companies Hart has appeared in X-rated features for are Smash Pictures, FM Concepts, Exile Pictures, Lethal Hardcore, Wicked Pictures, Mile High, and Kick Ass Pictures. Presley was the Pet of the Month for the March, 2013 issue of Penthouse. She likes to knit, read, cook, and sew in her spare time.
biography.name: Presley Hart

biography.bio: Tall (5'9"), buxom, and shapely blonde bombshell Summer Brielle Taylor was born on February 7, 1987 in Tennessee. Following graduation from high school, Taylor dabbled in local promotional modeling and did trophy girl work for sprint car races. Summer went on to model for Playboy (she's featured in two Playboy newsstand special editions from 2008). After brief stints as an exotic dancer and web-cam model, Taylor did her first hardcore shoot in 2010. Among the companies Summer has appeared in X-rated fare for are Wicked Pictures, FM Concepts, Kick Ass Pictures, Pulse Distribution, and Immoral Productions. Moreover, Summer has not only been featured in various magazines that include Hustler, High Society, and American Curves, but also has worked for such adult websites as Danni and Twistys. Outside of acting and modeling, Taylor is also a licensed cosmetologist.
biography.name: Summer Brielle

biography.bio: Ramon Guevara, more commonly recognized by the name of Ramon Nomar, is perhaps one the most popular male performers in the adult industry today. His career began in 1997 at 23 years old. Born of Latin descent in Caracas, Venezuela on January 9, 1974, Ramon has established an on-going career spanning well over 10 years. He is perhaps one the friendliest men in the business on or off camera as he portrays characters who are often time soft-spoken, foreign individuals, being enlightened to the sexual prowess of American women. Other roles in the erotic film world, include playing lucky repair men, to high-paid rock stars, living it up. He is married to the equally-popular porn star Madelyn Marie.
biography.name: Ramon Nomar

biography.bio: Tony Ribas is also known as Toni Ribas and Tony Ribes. He is the product of Spain. He began his career in the pornographic film industry in 1997, the same year in which Sophie Evans made her debut. The two later married and went on to appear in several film shoots together. Tony Ribas later began directing erotic films in 2001, with a notable series entitled Hardcore Innocence. This series ran from 2001-2003 with a total of 9 films, all of which Tony appeared in as well. Thus far, Tony has starred in over 550 films and directed over 80 films and his work has been recognized with winning an AVN award.
biography.name: Toni Ribas

biography.bio: Handsome and muscular Mr. Pete was born Peter Digirolamo on January 30, 1980 in Las Vegas, Nevada. He first got involved in the adult industry in the late 1990's after meeting hardcore actress Capri Cameron in a strip club. Mr. Pete first began performing in porn movies in 2000 and directed his first X-rated feature in 2003. Nominated for a XRCO Award for Unsung Woodsman in 2007, he won the XRCO Award for Unsung Swordsman in 2012. Moreover, Mr. Pete won the AVN Awards for Most Outrageous Sex Scene in 2004, Best Group Sex Scene in 2007, and Best Three-Way Sex Scene in 2011. He's married to adult film actress Alexis Texas.
biography.name: Mr. Pete

biography.bio: Erik Everhard was born on December 2, 1976 in Calgary, Alberta, Canada as Mitch Hartwell. He is an actor and director.
biography.name: Erik Everhard
